ftbultimine.change_shape: Hold Shift + (Scroll Mouse or Arrow up/down) to change shape
item.ftbultimine.ultiminer.tooltip: Enables the use of %s when active
ftbultimine.client_settings.render_outli: Max. Blocks to Render Outline for
ftbultimine.client_settings.require_snea: When the Ultimine key is pressed, must the player also Sneak to show the shapes menu?
ftbultimine.client_settings.shape_menu_c: When displaying the shape selection menu by holding the Ultimine key and sneaking at the same time, the number of shape names to display above and below the selected shape
ftbultimine.server_settings.merge_tags.t: For shapeless digging mode, any blocks in these tags which match the original dug block are valid candidates for Ultimining.
ftbultimine.server_settings.merge_tags_s:
For shaped digging modes, any blocks in these tags which match the original dug block are valid candidates for Ultimining.
Default of '*' means any block is a valid candidate.
ftbultimine.server_settings.prevent_tool: Ultimining will stop if the equipped tool has this much damage or less remaining. Setting this to 0 allows tools to break.
ftbultimine.server_settings.cancel_on_bl: Advanced setting: stop digging if unbreakable blocks are encountered instead of skipping over those blocks
ftbultimine.server_settings.require_tool: Players must have a damageable tool equipped, or an item in the 'ftbultimine:tools' item tag
ftbultimine.server_settings.experience_p: This can be a fractional amount
ftbultimine.server_settings.ultimine_coo: Time in ticks required between successive uses of the Ultimine function
